reviews.review_text: Best burger place in town. The flavours are amazing and the meat is juicy and delicious. The staff is friendly and the ambience is great. Must visit!
Everything about the burger here was perfect and tasted like a home made burger. Everyone, give it a try and you probably wont regret it. Food
Excellent burger im from Montreal and next time I come back to this area, I will definitely come back. Thank you Vera
Its my first time here today. I was very happy with the very kind customer service. She explained the hamburger well to me and it was very surprising         Thank you for your service.

Best burgers in town hands down! We always get the Vera burger original and never been disappointed. The meat is so delicious (thats what she said), tasty and freshly made. It is not a typical fast food burger as they do take their time to prep it, around 15 minutes, but the wait is worth it. When we crave for a  burger, we think of Vera, specifically this location, not sure about other locations.

The cashier/waitress was so Nice and  patient, quite fast for grill burger ( I mean delicious food takes time to be ready) Ordered:The Canuc and a milkshake and a double special with cheesse and pop Food:Good, the paty was super thick and tasty, milkshake good. fries normal Prices: Well the quality and paty size is generous so prices are accordingly but I would add the fries or any small side because it feels like high prices. They mistake my order, and gave me an aditional milkshake with the righ flavor to go so thoughul
Great place, Vancouvers best burger for sure. Friendly staff, and always helpful. This is a place I will always return to when Im in the city. Cant miss.

Best burgers on earth! They are pricey, & you have to wait a while for them to prepare it, but youll never walk out of there thinking about those things bc the food is always awesome. Even the sauces like chipotle & BBQ are terrific & taste homemade (IDK if they are). Cant recommend the lamb & G-Money burgers highly enough. Shakes are great too.
Google was right - best burgers in town! Fresh meat, and the fries were perfection. And a reasonable cost!

The saying goes - Veras Meat cant be beat! They definitely have the tastiest burgers. The Canuck is my favourite, with side of onion rings. The prices are a bit higher, but the quality is absolutely worth it. Theyre open late! The staff here are really friendly. Its always nice and clean with an open kitchen. Thank you Veras!
So so good ! Cajun burger is a killer !

We ordered two Vera burgers! Mine (right side) was with a fried egg, and Chipotle mayo. My partner added a cheddar cheese. Food was amazingly delicious as always. Vera s burger is always my go-to place. Never disappointed at me! The staff was friendly and nicely asked us if the food was okay. We were surprised because mostly staff in the fast food restaurant haven t ever asked before. p.s. I like it here, since my cousin s name is Vera
Been there twice so far on my visit to Canada. Both burgers were excellent

Ruby was amazing all night long! She has always been the best every time I come. She takes care of everybody every time I am here. She is the best and I would 10/10 recommended this place. If you re ever coming in make sure she s working! If she s not you ll still great service but you ll get even better service when she s here. Would give more than 5 stars if I could. Ps. The food is more than you can dream of. Vegetarian options: Veggie patties, poutine, extremely willing to accommodate. Dietary restrictions: Gluten and dairy free options. Allergy friendly. Wheelchair accessibility: Main floor. No ramps or stairs. Washroom is accessible.

I really like this burger restaurant. The burgers are home made and still hand pressed. I ordered the double burger and there was so much meat that I had to deconstruct the burger to eat it. The toppings were fresh and the onion rings were amazing. I definitely recommend this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jorge for your valuable feedback.

reviews.review_text: Amazing food, specially their bottle caps, haven t taste like this anywhere else. Very kind, friendly and very respectful. I ordered my food and then I realized I left my wallet home, the owner asked me to sit down and enjoy the meal without paying. This tells a lot about who running this business. Tasty, fast, and friendly environment.

THE MOST ASMAZING, hardest working ladies I have ever came across  have been a consistent customer since 2020 and have never felt more accepted and connected with any other burger place! MISS RUBY (and that s what everyone calls her) is the sweetest soul ever!! 1000/10 recommend this place to everyone!!!! Come get the food u crave no joke so delicious Vegetarian options: Amazing! Kid-friendliness: Absolutely!! Fires, poutine, onion rings, burgers!!! Wheelchair accessibility: No stairs extremely accesible
This is my favourite burger joint! I love the double BBQ burger with yam fries and beer! The owner is always working hard and provides the best customer service!
Best burgers in the town... Love their burgers, milkshakes and jalapeno bottle caps.

Totally awesome food and super friendly and down to earth staff. Also, as someone who is allergic to gluten, their gluten free bun is totally killer! Burger, fries, or shakes, everything I ve had here has always been super delicious, flavourful and fresh tasting. I live nearby and have been many times. It can be a touch pricey, but the quality of the food reflects the cost. Fantastic place to get a delicious, no frills, burger and beer, shake, or soda. I have faith that if you decide to pay them a visit they won t let you down!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cristina Thank you for your valuable feedback. Hope to see you soon!!

reviews.review_text: Had the chance to eat here this evening, after walking by many times, and was absolutely blown away by the meal we had. The burger was absolute perfection; cooked perfectly and incredibly flavourful. Just an amazing meal, cannot recommend highly enough.

Vera s is THE SPOT for the nightlife industry crew on Davie, when the bars close and we are all off work at 3:30-4am and wretched from our long days the staff at Vera s is STILL going and is always there to serve us with friendly loving energy that feeds not only our stomachs but our hearts! (Cheesy but true!) it s so appreciated to be able to have a space to wind down after work and working in nightlife makes that really hard! Miss Ruby is the queen of maintaining the atmosphere at Vera s on the late night shifts and watching that woman WORK is so inspiring !!!! She is true community icon in the Davie street village!!! Loveeeeeee Vera s on Davie~

Veras always treats me well. I come here late at night, and ruby is always amazing and takes care of us. This is a safe environment, full of love and good food. I love coming here. I left my umbrella here once and they kept it in the back for me until I returned and could pick it up. Thank you so much Veras you make me feel so loved and so safe. I love you Ruby, you are so kind and so kind to me and my friends. Come here!!! Vegetarian options: Love it!!! Tasty
Good quality burgers
One of the best burger i ever had made with love from the lovely owner and her son its really amazing and taste sooo good

We recently had a less than wonderful burger experience somewhere else, and wanted to make up for it, and so came here on a recommendation. Fantastic. We all ate too much after enjoying our food, which is always the best indication of good comfort food. I enjoyed a massive burger with double most things and added deep fried jalapenos, also had a side of fries, more jalapenos, and poutine and a shake. All hit the spot - burger was juicy and cooked fresh, fries crisp, and I ended up only eating a quarter of my poutine because my kids fought over the rest and didn t share. Both kids say they would return, and their only complaint was the food was so good the ate until they felt ill. Serves them right. A bit more expensive than your regular fast food place, or their that other burger place down the street, but it s worth it. Money well spent, and time enjoyed.

Staff was super friendly and burgers were amazing! Had the chicken burger and beef burger; the chicken was huge and the beef burger was grrrrreat! Love the pride decorations as well. We definitely want to come back again.
Best burger place indeed ... fresh and tasty and excels in service .. great job ruby
Veras is awesome as always. Covid protocols followed. Juicy burgers couldnt ask for more.
Great burgers, great workers but this place seriously needs a reno.

I decided to get to get the Baja Burger, and it happens to be one of the best burgers I have ever had. On this un-expected journey I stumbled across this burgerjoint as well as the this gem named Ruby. She provided the best customer service as well as this recommendation- the baja burger! Vegetarian options: Sub any burger to veggie burger with no charge Dietary restrictions: Lettuce wrap, customizable burger options! Wheelchair accessibility: Very open no stairs

Great burger selection very tasty food. Open until 4am. Deep fried jalapenos are really good as well. Everyday during the week there is a promotion on each burger. The attention was great from the 2 staff members. Its amazing how they run all that operation only with 2 people. You can also have shots of tequila and beer and get absolutely hammered right beside other bars at a way cheaper price. Always recommended to visit Veras burger
It was really really good, Your burgers with fried egg so delicious
Came at 10 for a burger before clubbing. The vera burger was perfect, not too oily, very flavorful and fries the same. Very chill with good music volume. Highly recommend:)
Are you kidding me? Ruby gave us the best service and burger we have ever had in Vancouver. This place is a must visit for anyone stopping in   a davie street essential !

We love it here! Incredible Service that always feels like home. We grab dinner here regularly and hv tried most of the items on the menu. Our favourites are the the onion rings, poutine & Buffalo Chicken burger. So good!! We have also ordered it via Uber Eats and it came super fast. The onion rings r fresh and crispy. The fries and poutine are delish. Lots of gravy and cheese. The Buffalo chicken has a sauce on it that is awesome. Not too spicy but just enough kick to give it an amazing flavour. The best thing about this spot, when going in person, is the service. The ladies who work here are very family oriented in the sense that they are personable and remember you when you return. Its really nice to have that special personable service in a city that can sometimes leave you feeling invisible :-) We will keep coming back here...hopefully for a long long time <3

Vera s Burgers are the best in the City!!! Quality ingredients, fabulous beef patty and great fixings! Onion rings are fabulous as well. Fries are generously proportioned. A regular go-to in the West End!

Uber eats charged us for an order even though we cancelled over 45 minutes before it was due for delivery. When we spoke to the owner, Ruby, at this location,  she went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied. She made our meals on the house and they tasted great. We had the buffalo chicken burger, and the lamb burger with fries and onion rings. All top quality. When management is kind and treats their customers well, it s good to support those kinds of places. Will be back for sure.
Veras is always the best place to go. The food is amazing. And not to mention ruby and sandy are the best. If you ever have the opportunity to see them, they will make your meal memorable.

This is an amazing Veras joint I know theres many of them around but this one downtown not only whenever I call. ...  I cant even get through half of my order before she knows who I am and she remembers exactly what I got last time. Always with a friendly voice and when I arrive asks me how I am and I feel more like a friend than just a place that I go to eat. One time they missed my gravy and I went back up there and she gave me another gravy on top of the one that I purchased and a gift certificate. She has amazing customer service I see her working all the time shes a very hard worker and anyone that could ever write a bad review I would never take seriously. With so many burger joints around downtown I will always go to Veras. Thank you for the amazing service and the amazing food.
The best burger joint in town. Came here after clubbing and the food was delicious and the service was outstanding. Will come here again. Highly recommend this place.
Expensive but worth it. The Frank burger, a beef patty with a frankfurter and the usual suspects is so tasty. Tip: asked to double patty and paid $21 for it inc tax. Food

This place is fantastic, the lady running it had to be one of the hardest working people I know. I used to go here for pickups only and when I was under pressure I used to get mad about waiting so we had kind of a rough patch. Everythings cool now bc I was being impatient and I realize it takes time to make good food. And these burgers are the schizz bizz. Also thanks to vivid we can now take out alcohol with our orders. Im working my way through the whole menu of burgers and I suggest you do the same.
Spectacular! You make the best burgers in the city!

The woman working the closing shift at Davie on 420 has the patience and care of a saint. 130am full of all obnoxious types, not an eye batted AND she also came out to my table to make sure I wanted mayo. Lamb burger was incredible, but not as incredible as this lady. Fantastic and lovely human being   thank you so much!
BBQ burgers are delicious and the onion rings were so good that we ordered more! Ruby took great care of us and we ll be back!

Came here at 11:30pm on a Wednesday, only one girl working. She has a fantastic attitude, was HUSTLING, cooking and doing all transactions on her own. The food was DELICIOUS, I got the lamb burger and my girlfriend got the Vegetarian Cajun burger. The fries with the vegetarian gravy were amazing also. I never leave reviews but felt it necessary here for sure. Incredibly impressed. Would recommend to anyone.
Great burgers. Place could be cleaner lol

Pricy BUT delicious. Once awhile strategy to taste food around. We had only burgers which is cost more than $12 but it s worth it. We would love to try it again when we visit Vancouver. Would be great if they have variety of bun choices such as whole grain or gluten free.
The burgers did not disappoint! Tasted 100% homemade; the shakes were just as delicious, and the staff was super friendly. Will definitely return.
Great burger, freshly made and full of flavour. Not overdone with whacky sauces.

Just finished a baja burger and it was delicious! Been coming to this location for the past 4 years and always a pleasant experience! These guys keep it very clean and food safe unlike some of the other places I have been to in Vancouver. Shout out to Ruby, my gal always making me the best burger and she always has a smile on! Good people and good service always!

Vera s on Davie is my #1 favourite burger place in Vancouver! I have been coming here for years and the quality of the food and friendly service bring me back every time! The owner has a lot of heart and puts lots of love into the food. Love supporting female run business!
We had veggie burgers, delicious, milk shake was decent but had a fake taste, service/owner was amazing. Really works hard and tries her best to make the experience for her customers.
Love that they will sub any patty with veggie at N/C. The burgers and fries are delicious! Located in a great neighborhood.

Veras on Davies serves the best burger in town. The burger was made to perfection and it wasnt pricey.  I was on short lunch break and I didnt have to wait too long. Great customer service and the servers were very friendly with helpful suggestions. Definitely the best burger in town!!!!
The staff there are the most friendly people Ive met at a fast food joint, their food slaps hard when youre sober or drunk. I highly recommend anyone make their way down to Veras on Davie.
So good! Dangerously good! Full disclaimer the ten beers before might have altered my perception!!

Went here for lunch on Sat. afternoon and it was incredible!  Super tasty burgers (both beef and lamb) and friendly customer service.  I used to live in Kits and frequented that location but this experience was much better.  Look forward to coming here regularly for my $27 monster burger!  Delicious!
poutine was good and a solid burger.

Ruby is an absolute gem! She is the most hospitable service worker I ve ever met! Her one woman army late night service is unparalleled. No where out on Davie can compete. If you re hangry after midnight, go find her. A little patience for the food is all u need.
The best burgers I have ever tasted in a long time! Ruby introduced me to different tastes of the menu and it was amazing!! Best place to order hands down!!
such a lovely place with AMAZING POUTINE. ruby is one of kindest people i have ever met, we love u vera s burger shack

Ruby gave us excellent service! She catered to all our needs by informing us about all the dips available. She was very considerate of our time and gave us the best service! Thank you ruby! We appreciate you !!

One of the best burger joint!!! These guys make awesome burgers and always a lovely experience. Had the Cajun burger and it was delicious. They are always friendly and welcoming. Anyone looking for gourmet burger with unique flavours, Veras on davie does a great job. Its true, you cant beat Veras meat.

I m so glad I discovered this place! I almost tried everything here and I can say one of the best burgers in the town. Not only the taste, but the service is high quality!  Ruby , the lady who works here with her young partner provide a service beyond my expectation! Very respectful, professional, and positive. Thanks

Best place for a delicious burger! Ruby the owner is super awesome and amazing ! Every time we come we feel like family here . Quality and attention to detail every time . Thank you Ruby for running an awesome establishment in the Davie village!

Amazing burger! It was my first time and I am in love! I had the stinger burger and it has these little jalapeno bottle caps and they are amazing! Nice rustic place, very warm and friendly service. Must try!

Just finished one of the best burgers Ive had in a long long time. I ordered The Canuck from the super friendly staff, watched them make it from great looking ingredients, and received a great looking burger that tasted even better than it looked. Front and back of house looked very clean and tidy, service was efficient, and I have no doubt Ill be full for a long time! Could not recommend highly enough.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ger for your valuable time and positive feedback. We would love to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: This place is awesome! The food is good. The drinks are good. However, what makes it stand out is the customer service! The staff is so friendly and courteous, while the service is timely and prompt! Its hard to expect that kind of service from a place right in the middle of downtown, considering theres no shortage of business coming in. We were here in the evening on a Friday where I assume its quite busy, and the service was still fantastic! Ill definitely recommend this place to anyone and Ill for sure be coming back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Joe I highly appreciate  you  for recognising our effort and you putting your valuable time in reviewing us. Thanks for your time and recognising our hard  work and passion in serving our customers. Hope to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: I love burgers and Vera s on Davie definitely makes the best. Never disappointed. Great customer service; polite and friendly. I was there couple of days ago and had the organic burger with yam fries! Simply delicious. If you are looking for gourmet burger, be sure to check Vera s on Davie. Been a loyal customer to Davie location for over 5 years!

This review is entirely based on this particular location as it serves one of best   hamburgers that I ever had in my life. I was greeted very politely by the owner who suggested few options in terms of dietary restrictions. My burger cooked about a medium just the way I like it with onion rings. Great experience!!!!!!!!!

Great burger joint in town. I have been going to this location for a long time and they always make good burgers. Friendly staff and great customer service. Owner is a nice fellow and had been running the place really well. Best burger in town. Check out this location, you won t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewer_name: Golden Rules of Wine and Travel
reviews.review_text: After a day of running all around Vancouver before a meeting, I was really craving a burger.  A really good burger.  A spectacular and indulgent burger. Yelp saves me in these situations, so I did a search and headed over to Veras.  Parking was really easy to find on the street.  (Side note: I love parking in Vancouver because it is so easy to do with credit cards.  The flashing green traffic lights I still dont understand...)  I got a little nervous about the outside because the awning is ostentatious and still doesnt really stand out compared to what is next to it, but then I went inside. With hockey playing on four screens, this feels like a very Canadian way of eating a burger, but somehow it doesnt feel too sports-bar-like.  Clean and open, it is easy to read the menus and order.  The cashier was very friendly and told me she would bring the food to me. I ordered sweet potato fries and they were perfect; both crispy and hot. This is a rarity for sweet potato fries, which I can never figure out.  If they have good breading, they arent hot; if they are hot, they dont taste good.  Somehow, Veras pulled it off. The burger was also great. I ordered the works and pulled a few things off because it was so big.  A very sweet, gruff-voiced attendant (possibly the owner) checked on me to see if they needed to fix the order, although it was perfect.  He checked on me at the end, too.  The entire time I was eating, he was constantly cleaning and taking care of tables.  Really incredible service and attention. I am over-the-top impressed.

Best burgers I have ever had in my life!! The fries and chicken wings are the best I ve ever had to! Staff is amazing, so friendly, the cook is very friendly. This is now a location I ll always visit when in Vancouver! Great place.

Gotta say, I definitely cannot beat Veras meat. It was amazing. Cooked to perfection and absolutely delicious. I ordered the Classic Canuck with poutine and a soda. Was incredibly good. I ordered two patties on the burger and, even though I made sure to finish, it was a lot of food. I think Ill order just one patty next time. But hot dang this is an amazing burger place. The person running store was just awesome: friendly and welcoming. She even checked on us after we got our food. She made the experience.

The classic! I love Veras, everything has been delicious. Staff are friendly and portions are verging on too generous. All it needs now is to re-work its seating set up so you dont have to suck in your stomach the whole time youre there to sit down.
Amazing service by Ruby. Great Canuck Burger and yam fries. Thanks

Burgers were great. The service was good, very understanding and accomodating. We were there just before dinner and staff were cleaning and wiping down every surface including menus, picture frames and walls. The place is spotless!

Delicious burger and fries. Love their food and always a great service. Usually go on the weekend and they are pretty packed! No fuss, no issues, we either eat in or take out,  always a plesant experience! Check it out! Won t be disappointed!

If you are ever in downtown and would like to try a juicy and flavourful patty head straight to Vera s! Outstanding succulent chicken patty and lovely vibe! Lots of add ons and Vera s special sauce is must try!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sanjog for your valuable feedback!

reviews.review_text: This time I trusted the evaluations of nearly 700 customers, which seem happy to choose Veras Burger Schack. I started with a Pawer and left my G- money  with a single patty. The truth is I was travelling all day to get here, this there were lots of space! Dont forget to try the Red Truck IPA, amazing!
Amazing service and great food and drinks so glad i went there ! Ruby and her team were awesome and i will definitely be back to see them!

Terrific burger! We didn t exactly come all the way from England just to go to Vera s, but heard about it when here. Well worth the trip and good value for money. Everything cooked from scratch to order: excellent!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Richard Thanks a lot for your visit and appreciate your valuable time in putting an incredible review for us.  Hope to see you again soon during your stay in Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: They really use the best ingredients in town. Their slogan says it all, You Cant Beat Veras Meat! Getting a double burger with one of the patties upgraded to lamb is heavenly!!! Theyll customized your order perfectly, half-sauces, extra lettuce, whatever you want, just ask.
It was the best burger I  ever had.it was cooked well and juicy at the same time!the staff was so nice too

DELICIOUS BURGERS imagine all you can do in a day and still have a fine burger at 2:32 am! It was an odd experience that evening but after we had burgers together, I had Baja burger and fries. A year later I was reminiscing in the same spot, Baja tastes delicious as ever! Girls working here are incredibly hard working please support them!
It is 100% worth waiting 20 minutes for one of these burgers. Theyre also open late!

Fantastic food,  genuinely welcoming customer service, open impressively late, and the greatest slogan in all of food - if not marketing - history,  You can t beat Vera s Meat . I ll admit that my legal and medical advice is not very sound, or  legal , but this is a recommendation i firmly stand behind.

Like the slogan says  you cant beat Veras meat  I recommend the Canuck burger. One if the tastiest places to get a burger. A little more priced than the other places but the finished burger way out front in quality. Taste. Fresh ingredients. Real cheddar cheese and grade a beef thats fresh never been frozen. Add a side of chips and prepare to undo the top button on your pants.that full feeling your rarely get from dining out. The service also one of the friendliest places. A bit if a wait but well worth it
Great spot for a freshly made burger. Fun spot

Veras burger shack is definitely the best burger spot in town by far! Please do not be fooled by the reviews at other places as no other burger place has as good food or staff as this place. We were fooled by the reviews and went to a different burger place and were welcomed with atrociously rude staff and high prices. We then decided to come here where they served us delicious burgers in half the time and money of any other burger place! The best place in town if your looking for a tasty burger I would recommend getting the bacon cheese burger as it was amazing but I m sure anything you get here will be better than the other burger places I. Town!
Best experience!!! Ruby was so nice and went above and beyond to make sure we had a great experience. It was so late at night and she was still giving 110%!! We really appreciated it
Miss Ruby is the best!! Such a inviting environment and amazing serves ALWAYS!! Amazing food!!

Amazing service and awesome food. Their veggie burger with the sauteed mushrooms and Havarti cheese is mouth watering. It looks like a family run business with a spot on service. The restaurant was very clean and tidy despite the fact they were quite busy. Really impressed.
Very nice customer service, patience and kind! Nice atmosphere. Lovely draft and sweet potato fries
Very good burger. Ruby is a great host and good chill beer available till 4 is a big plus .Thank you

I usually don t write reviews, but Vera s on Davie deservs much appreciated feedback. I love their burgers and this location certainly makes the best! I work at st. Pauls and have busy schedule! They are always so quick and accomodating to my request! Hand made burgers made with a lot of care. Restaurant quality food and I say this with much certainity! Be sure to check it out! Great service for a fast food place and exceptionally delicious food!

Quite expensive for two burger meals but the quality is there. Buns are soft and burger meat is super fresh. Smells like a fresh bbq burger. You definitely get what you pay for. The Veras sauce is tasty and goes well with the crisp yam fries.

Best burger EVER. The quality of ingredients is so above par that nothing and no one has ever come close. Ive traveled the world. This is it. Worth the travel and parking blocks away if need be. The server is friendly too!
